issue.title: [Python] Use saved pandas metadata to determine default timestamp_as_object in to_pandas()
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-18175](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18175). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
If there is pandas metadata present and it indicates object dtype, we should use that to avoid conversion to `datetime64[ns]`, but keep `datetime` objects in `to_pandas`.
